item.title: Portable-Audio-SUCKS
item.description: One thing I’ve been thinking about is how much modern portable music listening SUCKS. In 2022 you have two options basically: Using your phone with wireless headphones or some stupid dongle or A poorly designed DAP Neither are very good in my opinion and I think it’s stupid how much we’ve gone backwards in the way we listen to music on the go. Using your phone to listen to music is no fun.
